#page-controller,#page-ft,#page-copyright,#dyc61,#page-relative,#page-tips,.result:not([tpl="wise_sf_news"]){display:none!important;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-img{position:relative;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppich3{color:#00c;font-size:0.18rem;line-height:0.22rem;font-weight:normal;padding:0.03rem00.01rem;box-sizing:border-box;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-img.c-img-w{margin-bottom:0;padding-bottom:36.0%;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-imglabel{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;padding:0.03rem0.07rem;color:#fff;font-size:0.13rem;line-height:0.15rem;background-color:#f13e41;}.wa-wise-sf-news-listul{list-style:none;}.wa-wise-sf-news-item{display:block;padding:0.1rem0;}.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-row{-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-align-items:center;}.wa-wise-sf-news-content{font-size:0.18rem;line-height:0.25rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-subcontent{font-size:0.13rem;line-height:0.20rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-tool{height:0.44rem;line-height:0.45rem;text-align:center;border-top:1pxsolid#f1f1f1;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toolimg{vertical-align:-0.03rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-line{height:.07rem;background-color:#f1f1f1;box-shadow:0-1px0#e7e7e7;}.wa-wise-sf-news-rsh3{font-size:0.18rem;line-height:0.54rem;font-weight:normal;text-align:center;}.wa-wise-sf-news-rsa{text-align:center;line-height:0.38rem;background-color:#f5f5f5;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-video{position:relative;line-height:0;z-index:1;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-duration{position:absolute;left:0;bottom:0;width:100%;height:0.28rem;line-height:0.30rem;color:#fff;text-align:right;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear,lefttop,leftbottom,color-stop(0%,rgba(0,0,0,0)),color-stop(100%,rgba(0,0,0,0.6)));}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-durationspan{margin-right:0.06rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-play{position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;width:0.38rem;margin:-0.19rem00-0.19rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-vd-icon{border:1pxsolid#f3c7c8;border-radius:.03rem;padding:.01rem.02rem0!important;color:#ef3f41;font-size:.11rem;font-style:normal;}.wa-wise-sf-news-vd-play{position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;width:0.32rem;margin:-0.16rem00-0.16rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-toppic-playimg,.wa-wise-sf-news-vd-playimg{width:100%;}/*重写栅格，资讯垂类样式*//*.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-img-x{padding-bottom:66.67%;height:0;overflow:hidden;}.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-row{padding:0;margin-left:-1px;margin-right:0;}.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-span4,.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-span12{padding-left:1px;padding-right:0;}*/.wa-wise-sf-news-item.c-span8{padding-left:14px;padding-right:0;}/*增加奥运运营和频道入口样式wangpei07*/.wa-wise-sf-news-channel{border-top:.06remsolid#f2f2f2;margin:0-.17rem;padding:0.17rem;height:.48rem;line-height:.48rem;text-align:center;box-shadow:0-1px0#e8e8e8;}.wa-wise-sf-news-channelimg{vertical-align:-0.05rem;}.wa-wise-sf-news-br1{border-right:1pxsolid#f2f2f2;}.wa-wise-sf-news-mbf8{margin-bottom:-.08rem;}中国国宝级专家严东生逝世享年98岁热点严东生院士逝世系无机材料学奠基人手机央视网11小时前严东生院士：无机材料大师的有情人生手机央视网11小时前两院院士严东生：人生辛苦半九十手机央视网11小时前更多相关结果大家还在搜严东生结婚照严东生院士严东生奖学金严东生女儿西南交大严东生严东生唐山交大/*<![CDATA[*/@font-face{font-family:ecomicons;src:url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/iconfont_9a4732b.eot);src:url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/iconfont_9a4732b.eot#iefix)format("embedded-opentype"),url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/iconfont_1fe9f7a.woff)format("woff"),url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/iconfont_f0823fb.ttf)format("truetype"),url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/iconfont_f0be303.svg?#iconfont)format("svg")}@font-face{font-family:ecomiconsadd;src:url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/font_icons/iconfont_add_168d2ae.eot);src:url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/font_icons/iconfont_add_5455c3d.woff)format("woff"),url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/font_icons/iconfont_add_578ba88.ttf)format("truetype"),url(//m.baidu.com/static/ecom/iphone_icons/font_icons/iconfont_add_4c07111.svg)format("svg")}.ec-font-small{font-size:13px}.ec_url{clear:both;white-space:nowrap}.ec_ad_results{position:relative}.ec_resitem{position:relative}.ec_xiaobao{height:28px;padding:1px0;position:absolute;top:0;right:-7px;z-index:20}.ec_xiaobaoa{display:inline-block;width:24px;height:24px;padding:4px6px00}.ec_urlbtn{display:inline;position:relative;float:right}.ec_tgsk,.ec_tgsk.ec_urlbtn{background:#F5F5F5}.ec_urlline{overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap}.ec_urlline_blank{width:100%;display:inline-block;padding:2px0;margin:-2px0;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.c-container.ec_resitem_card{margin:0;background-color:#fffcf8}.ec_guess{padding-bottom:8px;margin-top:-4px;margin-bottom:-4px}.ec_resitem_rs_more_btn_wrap{width:135px}.ec_resitem_rs_more_btn{float:right}.c-container.ec_resitem_rs{color:#666;padding-top:14px}.ec_resitem_rs_keyword{color:#333}.ec_resitem_card.ec_adv_last.c-line-bottom{border:0;padding-bottom:4px}.ec_ad_results.c-line-clamp2,.ec_ad_results.c-line-clamp3{margin-bottom:0}.c-text.ec-bgcolor-yellow{background:#f2ab36}.ec-link-blue{color:#00c}.ec-align-center{text-align:center}.ec_title.c-title{word-break:break-all}@media(min-width:375px){.ec_title.c-title{-webkit-line-clamp:3}.ec_title.c-line-clamp2{-webkit-line-clamp:2}.ec_title.c-line-clamp4{-webkit-line-clamp:4}}.ec_fright{float:right}.ec_hide{display:none}.ec_gap_left_6{margin-left:6px}.ec_wise_ad_card{margin:.06rem0}.ec_no_gap_left{margin-left:0!important}.ec_no_gap_right{margin-right:0!important}.ec_mengya_container{background-color:#fffcf8}.ec_mengya_container.ec_my_header{border-bottom:1pxsolid#f1f1f1;color:#666;padding-bottom:6px;margin-bottom:14px}.ec-m2-right{margin-right:.15rem}.ec_clearfix:after{visibility:hidden;display:block;font-size:0;content:"";clear:both;height:0}.ec_tg_js{color:#999!important;}/*]]>*/相关搜索严东生结婚照严东生院士严东生奖学金严东生女儿西南交大严东生严东生唐山交大严东生景德镇严东生这名字咋样 下一页相关搜索严东生结婚照严东生院士严东生奖学金严东生女儿西南交大严东生严东生唐山交大严东生景德镇严东生这名字咋样
